name: layered animated figure (407 ch)
author: FabriceNeyret2
description:
golfing fading-less version of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/XsGyRm[/url]
Reproducing [url]https://www.facebook.com/CosmosUpp/videos/1001518269996955/[/url]
image_code:
// golfing fading-less version of https://shadertoy.com/view/XsGyRm

#define P(i) cos(2.6914*(i)+T*.1 + vec2(0,11) ) // heptastar vertex i
#define S(D) dot( A=(D)*R.y , A )               // smooth draw                                  
#define L(b) 1./ S( -clamp(dot(B=b-Q, A=U-Q)/dot(B,B), 0.,1.) *B +A) // draw a line
                                                // point(n,t) on heptastar 
#define p(d) mix( P(i= ceil( t= T/5.+ (n d)*.583)), P(--i), .5+.5*cos(3.*fract(t)) )

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2 A,B,Q,R=iResolution.xy, U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y;
    for ( float t,i,T=iTime, n=0.; n++ < 12.;
        O.a += 30. / S( Q-U ) )               /* dots         */
        Q = P(n),
        O.rga += n>5. ? L( P(n+1.) ) : 0.,    /* yellow lines */
        Q = p(),
        O.ra += L( p(+4.) ),                  /* triangles    */
        O.ba += L( p(+3.) );                  /* squares      */
    O += 1.4-.7*O.a; }                        /* background   */
